abilities.name: Stand Vigil
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker, re-roll all failed Wound rolls instead.

abilities.name: Sentinel Storm
abilities.description: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, it can shoot again.

abilities.name: Vexilla Magnifica
abilities.description: While a friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit is within 6" of this unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Resolute Will
abilities.description: While this unit contains a Character, subtract 1 from the Wound roll when the Strength of the attack exceeds this unit's Toughness.

abilities.name: Living Fortress
abilities.description: Once per battle, this unit gains Feel No Pain 4+ until the end of the phase.

abilities.name: Vexilla Magnifica
abilities.description: While a friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit is within 6" of this unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and deployed more than 9" from enemy models.

abilities.name: Slayers of Tyrants
abilities.description: Re-roll Wound rolls when attacking Characters, Monsters, or Vehicles.

abilities.name: From Golden Light
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the end of your opponent's turn, if not in Engagement Range, remove this unit and redeploy it via Deep Strike.

abilities.name: Vexilla Magnifica
abilities.description: While a friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit is within 6" of this unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Daughters of the Abyss
abilities.description: Feel No Pain 3+ against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Purity of Execution
abilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting PSYKER units gain Precision and Devastating Wounds.

abilities.name: Daughters of the Abyss
abilities.description: Feel No Pain 3+ against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deft Parry
abilities.description: Melee attacks targeting this unit suffer -1 to Hit.

abilities.name: Scouts 6"
abilities.description: This unit can make a Normal move of up to 6" before the first turn begins.

abilities.name: Daughters of the Abyss
abilities.description: Feel No Pain 3+ against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Sanctified Flames
abilities.description: After shooting, one enemy unit hit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Turbo-boost
abilities.description: When Advancing, add 6" to Move instead of rolling.

abilities.name: Quicksilver Execution
abilities.description: Once per battle, after moving over enemy units, roll D6 per model: on 2+, deal 2 mortal wounds to non-Monster/Vehicle targets.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Custodian Guard or Custodian Wardens.

abilities.name: Master of the Stances
abilities.description: Once per battle, when fighting, both Ka'tah Stances are active for this unit.

abilities.name: Strategic Mastery
abilities.description: Once per battle round, reduce the CP cost of a Stratagem used on this model by 1CP.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Custodian Guard or Custodian Wardens.

abilities.name: Swift Onslaught
abilities.description: Re-roll Charge rolls for this unit.

abilities.name: Martial Inspiration
abilities.description: Once per battle, this unit can charge after Advancing.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Custodian Guard or Custodian Wardens.

abilities.name: Captain-General
abilities.description: While leading a unit, ignore modifiers to BS and WS for attacks made by models in this unit.

abilities.name: Moment Shackle
abilities.description: Once per battle in the Fight phase, choose either: make 12 attacks with the Watcher's Axe, or gain a 2+ invulnerable save until end of phase.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 5+
abilities.description: This model has Feel No Pain 5+.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Prosecutors, Vigilators, or Witchseekers.

abilities.name: Scouts 6"
abilities.description: This unit can make a Normal move of up to 6" before the first turn begins.

abilities.name: Seeker's Instincts
abilities.description: Add 2" to Move and +2 to Advance/Charge rolls for the led unit.

abilities.name: Daughters of the Abyss
abilities.description: Feel No Pain 3+ against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Corner the Quarry
abilities.description: Enemy non-Monster/Vehicle units falling back must take Desperate Escape tests.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When destroyed, on a 6, nearby units suffer 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Unyielding Ancient
abilities.description: First time destroyed, at end of phase, on 2+, set back up with D6 wounds remaining.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When destroyed, on a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Assault Ramp
abilities.description: Units disembarking can charge after a Normal move.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: Capacity: 6 Adeptus Custodes Infantry models.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When destroyed, on a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Advanced Firepower
abilities.description: Accelerator cannon gains Lethal Hits vs non-Monster/Vehicle; Blaze cannon gains Lethal Hits vs Monster/Vehicle.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds
abilities.description: When 1-5 wounds remaining, subtract 1 from Hit rolls.

rules.name: Martial Mastery
rules.description: At the start of each battle round, select one: unmodified hit rolls of 5+ score critical hits in melee, OR improve AP of melee weapons by 1. Applies to units with Martial Ka'tah.

stratagems.name: Arcane Genetic Alchemy
stratagems.description: After mortal wound allocation, unit gains Feel No Pain 4+ against mortal wounds until end of phase.

stratagems.name: Avenge the Fallen
stratagems.description: Below Starting Strength: +1 Attack. Below Half-strength: +2 Attacks instead.

stratagems.name: Unwavering Sentinels
stratagems.description: Infantry unit holding objective: attacks targeting it suffer -1 to Hit in melee.

stratagems.name: Multipotentiality
stratagems.description: Unit that fell back is eligible to shoot and charge this turn.

stratagems.name: Vigilance Eternal
stratagems.description: Battleline unit holds objective even if no models are within range of it.

stratagems.name: Archeotech Munitions
stratagems.description: Unit gains Lethal Hits or Sustained Hits 1 until end of phase.

enhancements.name: Auric Mantle
enhancements.description: Shield-Captain or Blade Champion only. Bearer gains +2 Wounds.

enhancements.name: Castellan's Mark
enhancements.description: Shield-Captain only. After deployment, redeploy up to two Adeptus Custodes units. May place in Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: From the Hall of Armouries
enhancements.description: Shield-Captain only. Add +1 Strength and +1 Damage to melee weapons.

enhancements.name: Panoptispex
enhancements.description: Shield-Captain or Blade Champion only. Bearer's unit ignores cover with ranged weapons.

rules.name: Revered Companions
rules.description: Anathema Psykana units have Null Aegis aura (6"): nearby Custodes gain Feel No Pain 5+ against psychic attacks and mortal wounds. Other Custodes units have Deadly Unity aura (6"): Anathema Psykana attacks gain +1 to Hit.

stratagems.name: Hunt as One
stratagems.description: Two units eligible to shoot/charge after falling back; one must be Anathema Psykana within 6".

stratagems.name: Talons Interlocked
stratagems.description: Two Infantry units focus fire on same target: gain +1 Strength and +1 AP.

stratagems.name: Empyric Severance
stratagems.description: Custodes unit gains Feel No Pain 4+ against psychic attacks if Anathema Psykana unit is nearby.

stratagems.name: Emperor's Executioners
stratagems.description: +1 to Wound rolls against enemies below Starting Strength.

stratagems.name: Taloned Pincer
stratagems.description: After enemy moves within 9", move up to 6".

stratagems.name: Shield of Honour
stratagems.description: Redirect attacks targeting Anathema Infantry to nearby Custodes Infantry.

enhancements.name: Aegis Projector
enhancements.description: Once per turn, change first failed saving throw to 0 damage.

enhancements.name: Champion of the Imperium
enhancements.description: Extends Null Aegis and Deadly Unity aura range to 9".

enhancements.name: Gift of Terran Artifice
enhancements.description: +1 to Wound rolls in melee.

enhancements.name: Radiant Mantle
enhancements.description: Attacks targeting bearer from within 12" suffer -1 to Hit.

rules.name: Creeping Dread
rules.description: Aura: Enemy Psyker and below-strength units within 12" of Anathema Psykana must take Battle-shock tests in opponent's Command phase. Below half-strength units subtract 1 from the test.

stratagems.name: Desperation's Price
stratagems.description: After enemy Psyker uses ability: Leadership test - pass = Battle-shocked, fail = D3 mortal wounds and Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: Witch Hunters
stratagems.description: Anathema unit gains Lethal Hits or Sustained Hits 1 (targets Psykers only).

stratagems.name: Anathema Blademastery
stratagems.description: Vigilators re-roll Hit rolls; re-roll Wounds vs Battle-shocked or Psyker.

stratagems.name: Psy-Chaff Volley
stratagems.description: Prosecutors' targets become 'prosecuted': enemy Psyker/Battle-shocked subtract 1 to Hit; Anathema gain +1 AP vs them.

stratagems.name: Purgation Sweep
stratagems.description: Witchseekers gain +1 Attack with Torrent weapons; +2 vs Psyker/Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: Psychic Abominations
stratagems.description: Anathema Infantry gains Stealth; Battle-shocked/Psykers can only target within 12".

enhancements.name: Enhanced Voidsheen Cloak
enhancements.description: Anathema model only. Subtract 1 from Damage; reduce to 1 if from Psyker or Battle-shocked.

enhancements.name: Huntress' Eye
enhancements.description: Anathema model only. In Command phase, select enemy within 12" to take Battle-shock test.

enhancements.name: Oblivion Knight
enhancements.description: Anathema model only. Led unit gains +1 to Hit; +1 to Wound vs Psyker units.

enhancements.name: Raptor Blade
enhancements.description: Anathema model only. +1 Attack, +1 Strength, +1 Damage; +2 each vs Battle-shocked Psykers.

rules.name: Assemblage of Might
rules.description: In your Command phase, select one enemy unit. Character units gain +1 to Wound rolls targeting it until your next Command phase.

stratagems.name: Slayer of Champions
stratagems.description: When Character destroys Assemblage target: select new target gaining +1 to Wound; gain 1CP if target was Character.

stratagems.name: Superhuman Reserves
stratagems.description: Warlord can use a 'once per battle' ability an additional time. Maximum once per battle.

stratagems.name: Emperor's Auspice
stratagems.description: Character unit gains Feel No Pain 4+ until end of phase.

stratagems.name: Earning of a Name
stratagems.description: Two Character units re-roll Hits and Wounds vs Monsters/Vehicles.

stratagems.name: Vigil Unending
stratagems.description: Destroyed Character fights before removal from play.

stratagems.name: Shoulder the Mantle
stratagems.description: Character not leading a unit attaches to nearby eligible unit.

enhancements.name: Blade Imperator
enhancements.description: On charge: D3 mortal wounds on 4+. Once per battle, nearby enemies take Battle-shock.

enhancements.name: Inspirational Exemplar
enhancements.description: Leadership 5+. Once per battle, remove Battle-shocked from friendly unit within 12".

enhancements.name: Martial Philosopher
enhancements.description: Unit eligible to shoot/charge after falling back. Once per battle, 6" move when enemy ends within 9".

enhancements.name: Veiled Blade
enhancements.description: +2 Attacks to melee weapons. Once per battle, triple Objective Control in Command phase.

rules.name: Auric Armour
rules.description: At Starting Strength: +2 OC (non-Aircraft, non-Battle-shocked). Below Starting Strength: re-roll Hit rolls of 1. Below Half-strength: re-roll Hit and Wound rolls of 1.

rules.name: Moritoi Ancients
rules.description: Walkers gain +2" Move and +1 to Advance/Charge rolls. Up to 2 Walker models can gain Character keyword.

stratagems.name: Unstoppable Advance
stratagems.description: Vehicle moves additional 6" after moving.

stratagems.name: Crushing Momentum
stratagems.description: Charging Vehicle re-rolls Charge roll and Hit rolls.

stratagems.name: Machine Spirit's Wrath
stratagems.description: Vehicle not selected to shoot makes attacks with full Ballistic Skill.

stratagems.name: Venerable Guardian
stratagems.description: Vehicle within range of objective gains +2 Toughness.

stratagems.name: Armored Breach
stratagems.description: Vehicle charges through terrain without penalty.

stratagems.name: Relic Onslaught
stratagems.description: Vehicle gains Lethal Hits or Sustained Hits 1.

enhancements.name: Adamantine Talisman
enhancements.description: Vehicle only. Gains Feel No Pain 4+.

enhancements.name: Armor of Eternal Fortune
enhancements.description: Vehicle only. -1 to Damage characteristic of attacks.

enhancements.name: Venerable Destroyer
enhancements.description: Vehicle only. +1 to Wound rolls; improve AP by 1.

enhancements.name: Warlord's Steed
enhancements.description: Vehicle only. +1 Objective Control at Starting Strength.

rules.name: Against All Odds
rules.description: Units below half-strength gain +1 Attack. Units below quarter-strength gain additional +1 Attack.

stratagems.name: Desperate Counter
stratagems.description: Below half-strength unit eligible to fight after falling back.

stratagems.name: Heroic Intervention
stratagems.description: Unit within 6" of charged unit can fight immediately.

stratagems.name: Refusal to Yield
stratagems.description: Below half-strength unit gains Feel No Pain 5+.

stratagems.name: Final Onslaught
stratagems.description: Dying model can make attacks before removal from play.

stratagems.name: Unyielding Stand
stratagems.description: Unit on objective: -1 to Wound rolls against it.

enhancements.name: Unstoppable Fury
enhancements.description: Melee weapons gain Lethal Hits.

enhancements.name: Unbreakable Will
enhancements.description: Model gains Feel No Pain 5+ and cannot be reduced below 1 wound per attack.

enhancements.name: Last Stand
enhancements.description: Once per battle, after casualties: auto-pass Battle-shock and heal 1 model.

enhancements.name: Valiant Heart
enhancements.description: Model's unit: -1 to Hit in melee against it.

martial_katah.name: Martial Ka'tah
martial_katah.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select a Ka'tah Stance to be active for your Custodes models.

imperial_agents.name: Imperial Agents
imperial_agents.description: Agents of the Imperium can be included in any IMPERIUM army.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: Can lead Inquisitorial Agents, Imperial Navy Breachers, Exaction Squad, Subductor Squad, Vigilant Squad, or any IMPERIUM BATTLELINE INFANTRY.

abilities.name: Authority of the Inquisition
abilities.description: While leading a unit, can embark in any TRANSPORT the Bodyguard unit can.

abilities.name: Xenos Hunter
abilities.description: While leading a unit, add +1 to Hit rolls against enemies without IMPERIUM or CHAOS keywords.

abilities.name: Psychic Veil
abilities.description: Command phase: Roll D6. On 1, suffer D3 mortal wounds. On 2+, can only be targeted by ranged attacks within 18" until next Command phase.

weapon.name: Anti-X #+
weapon.description: Improve AP by 1 and wound on #+ against targets with keyword X.

weapon.name: Assault
weapon.description: Can be shot after Advancing.

weapon.name: Blast
weapon.description: +1 Attack per 5 models in target unit.

weapon.name: Devastating Wounds
weapon.description: Critical wounds inflict mortal wounds equal to Damage, no saves allowed.

weapon.name: Extra Attacks
weapon.description: Attacks with this weapon are made in addition to other weapons.

weapon.name: Hazardous
weapon.description: After resolving attacks, roll D6. On 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds (Characters) or is destroyed (other models).

weapon.name: Heavy
weapon.description: +1 to Hit if unit Remained Stationary.

weapon.name: Ignores Cover
weapon.description: Target does not benefit from cover.

weapon.name: Indirect Fire
weapon.description: Can target units not visible. -1 to Hit, +1 to target's Save if not visible.

weapon.name: Lance
weapon.description: +1 to Wound if unit charged this turn.

weapon.name: Lethal Hits
weapon.description: Critical hits automatically wound (no wound roll needed).

weapon.name: Melta X
weapon.description: +X Damage against targets within half range.

weapon.name: One Shot
weapon.description: Can only be used once per battle.

weapon.name: Pistol
weapon.description: Can be shot in Engagement Range, but only at units in Engagement Range.

weapon.name: Precision
weapon.description: On critical wounds, attacker can allocate wound to a Character or Attached model.

weapon.name: Psychic
weapon.description: Weapon has the Psychic keyword for ability interactions.

weapon.name: Rapid Fire X
weapon.description: +X Attacks when targeting units within half range.

weapon.name: Sustained Hits X
weapon.description: Critical hits score X additional hits.

weapon.name: Torrent
weapon.description: Automatically hits (no hit roll needed).

weapon.name: Twin-linked
weapon.description: Re-roll wound rolls.

unit.name: Battleline
unit.description: Core troop units. May have special rules in certain detachments.

unit.name: Character
unit.description: Can lead units, receive Enhancements, and is targeted by Precision.

unit.name: Deep Strike
unit.description: Can be set up in Reserves and arrive 9"+ from enemies in Reinforcements step.

unit.name: Epic Hero
unit.description: Unique named character. Limited to 1 per army.

unit.name: Feel No Pain X+
unit.description: Roll D6 when losing a wound. On X+, wound is ignored.

unit.name: Fights First
unit.description: In Fight phase, fights before units without this ability.

unit.name: Fly
unit.description: Can move over models/terrain. Can move within Engagement Range freely.

unit.name: Infiltrators
unit.description: Can deploy anywhere 9"+ from enemy deployment zone and enemies.

unit.name: Leader
unit.description: Can be attached to Bodyguard units. Abilities affect the combined unit.

unit.name: Lone Operative
unit.description: Cannot be targeted unless within 12" of attacking model.

unit.name: Scouts X"
unit.description: Make a Normal move of up to X" before first turn begins.

unit.name: Stealth
unit.description: Ranged attacks targeting this unit suffer -1 to Hit.
